en.bailiffServiceSuccessful: A court bailiff successfully served the petition to your {{ divorceWho }} using the details provided in your request for court bailiff application.
en.sevenDaysToRespond: Your {{ divorceWho }} has been given 7 days to respond.
en.noResponseReceived: If no response is received, then you will still be able to continue to the next stage and apply for a decree nisi.
